verbs.description: i [V: 've] used a meditation app loved by wall streeters and olympic athletes daily for the past 8 months and now i ca n't imagine my life without it the smartphone app headspace has 8 5 million users and is both simple and effective richard branson goldman sachs arianna huffington puddicombe dana farber cancer institute meditation timothy ferriss wall streeters
